title: Drought feeding
brief_description: Discusses the various fuel values of different foodstuffs and gives much information on drought feeding of stock. Based on scientific investigations made by the Australian wool board into the subject of drought feeding of sheep, this film shows the fuel value of various types of supplementary fodder, taking into account both cost and nutritive value. The Wool Board makes available to pastoralists a Drought Feed Calculator, together with other tables relating to drought feeding, are clearly presented in this film.
